name: Parasitic Breach
description:
A game made for the SGDA Summer Game Jam 2022 which follows the theme:

"Game Over Isn't The End!

Play as a parasite that happens upon a space station and has its main mission be to infect as many people as possible. You can infect enemies to restore your health and gain the ability to use their weapons.

Controls:

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right

Left Mouse Button - Shoot / Swing

Esc - Pause

Credits:

Space Backgrounds: https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/space

Level Music: https://opengameart.org/content/electronic-friends

Endless Music: https://opengameart.org/content/high-tech-lab

Tileset: Warped Top-Down Tech Lab by ansimuz (itch.io)
